channel.title: Finance on loualiche misc.
channel.description: Recent content in Finance on loualiche misc.

item.title: TAQ Consolidated
item.description: For a recent revision, I have had to dig into TAQ data; I did not want to use SAS and I thought a combination of command line unix tools and julia would be easy. I learned a few things!

item.title: DataFrames and datatable
item.description: A guide for moving between Julia’s DataFrames.jl and R data.table. This follows the template of stata2r and gives side by side matches of common operation for data wrangling.
